title: GFPPC3_Pellet1
growth_protocol_ch1: Cells maintained in 37째C, 5% CO2, in 5%FBS/RPMI-1640. Stable cell lines were maintained in 0.1 mg/ml G418 (Gibco).
extract_protocol_ch1: Extracellular vesicles were extracted using ultracentrifugation. Subsequent total RNA extraction from both EVs and cells completed using Trizol reagent. Small RNA were selected for sequencing using the NEBNext Small RNA library Prep Kit.
extract_protocol_ch1.1: Small RNA were selected for sequencing using the NEBNext Small RNA library Prep Kit. Libraries were size selected using a Perkin Elmer Labchip XT
data_processing: Base calls were generated using the Illumina NextSeq500 software, RTA (v2.1.3).
data_processing.1: Trimming of adaptor sequences was completed using cutadapt (v1.9) for the following adaptors: >TruSeq1  AGATCGGAAGAGCACACGTCTGAACTCCAGTCAC  >TruSight1  GCGAATTTCGACGATCGTTGCATTAACTCGCGA  Trimmed reads shorter than 1 base were discarded if any.
data_processing.2: Alignment to the whole known human miRNAome (miRbase v21) using STAR (v2.5.2a) and the following non-default parameters: --outFilterMismatchNoverLmax 0.05  --outFilterMatchNmin 16  --outFilterScoreMinOverLread 0  --outFilterMatchNminOverLread 0  --alignIntronMax 1
data_processing.3: Using samtools (v1.3), we merged and coordinate sorted the alignments
data_processing.4: Data was filtered using the following cut off: rowSums(row>20) >=2, where rowSums is the sum of all counts for miRNA across all replicates and test conditions.
data_processing.5: miRNAs were normalised using empirical normalization method from the RUVseq package and DESeq2 (default parameters)
data_processing.6: Genome_build: human mature sequences miRBase v21
data_processing.7: Supplementary_files_format_and_content: tab-delimited text file contains raw counts for identified miRNAs, pre- and post- filter, and normalised counts.
